name: Escaphole
description:
PROTOTYPE VERSION

I built this demo in 1 day, in fact, about 10 hours (Just because I have to do my course project ahahaha).

Movement: WASD

Click the attachable slots and,
-Left mouse button to attach
-Right mouse button to rotate your view
-Middle mouse button to delete

B: active booster engine

Change the blocks: 1 2 3 4...(more in the future)

Contact me if you have ideas and thoughts: anubis_nero@yeah.net

or comment below. 

Thanks all!
